overview_of_class: This course covers the fundamentals of database design and management. Topics include the principles and methodologies of database design, database application development, normalization, referential integrity, security, relational database models, and database languages. Principles are applied by performing written assignments and a project using an SQL database system.
name: Database Systems Design & Implementation
title: SCS CIS 317-CN-19 Database Systems Design & Implementation

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course covers the fundamentals of database design and management. Topics include the principles and methodologies of database design, database application development, normalization, referential integrity, security, relational database models, and database languages. Principles are applied by performing written assignments and a project using an SQL database system.

subject: CIS
